mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id
ll.log_type = '108'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and ll.abn_type like '%${abnType}%'
and ll.abn_level like '%${abnLevel}%'
and ll.equipment_exchange_time like '%${equipmentExchangeTime}%'

SELECT eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, dev.device_name, ll.abn_title, ll.abn_type, ll.abn_level, ll.abn_content, ll.equipment_exchange_time FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id
ll.log_type = '108'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and ll.abn_type like '%${abnType}%'
and ll.abn_level like '%${abnLevel}%'
and ll.equipment_exchange_time like '%${equipmentExchangeTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
